body: These decorative bracers are stippled with vibrant colors and have various tiny bells sewn onto their surface. While wearing them, the wearer gains a +5 competence bonus on Perform checks. Once per day on command, the user can gain the benefit of the glibness spell.
name: Bracers of the Glib Entertainer
